title: Swarna Kundan Jhumkas: A Blossoming Cascade of Tradition
materials: 22K Gold (Suddha Bangaram) with Hyderabadi Polish. Adorned with meticulously set Cubic Zirconia (CZ) simulating Polki Diamonds. Features dangling
features: Classic bell-shaped Jhumka design with intricate filigree work and floral motifs. The open setting enhances the brilliance of the CZ stones. The cascading pearl drops (gundlu) add a touch of grace and movement. Features a stud closure for secure and comfortable wear.
colors: Warm yellow gold with dazzling white CZ stones and creamy ivory pearls. The gold provides a rich
traditional contrast to the sparkle of the CZ
reminiscent of traditional South Indian color palettes.
occasions: and other special occasions. Also ideal for a half-saree function (Langa Voni Function) or any event where you want to showcase your traditional style with a touch of modern sparkle.
description: These Jhumkas are a stunning blend of traditional South Indian design and contemporary elegance. The high-quality gold and meticulous craftsmanship ensure lasting beauty. The CZ stones offer the brilliance of diamonds at an accessible price point. The timeless Jhumka design is a must-have for any South Indian jewelry collection, making it a valuable heirloom piece. The Hyderabadi polish adds a unique luster and richness.
